ObjectClass.Name: Octopod
ObjectClass.Description:
OCTOPOD: Biological main ground-assault armor Hard hitting AG sniper; No AA Long reload on AG cannon [8s] Advanced shield regeneration
Morphs into Ghost

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 24, Aggro Radius: 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\8s mobile reload process\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 150, R 22, Sta C

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Regenerate Shields
Objective.Details: Active: Fully restores shields (8 s)\Avoid using near combat\ \Passive: +20 HP/s when below 60% HP

Objective.Name: Morph to Ghost Octopod
Objective.Details: High efficiency support healer\WARNING: Not equipped for \close combat conditions\ \Non-reversible morph

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another -pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\Sepipod: progenerate Pharo(-ligo) units\- Pharopod: progenerate Sepi(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another -pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\Sepipod: progenerate Pharo(-ligo) units\- Pharopod: progenerate Sepi(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\Must upgrade Chronoporting\in Reaph building

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
